Parker writes:
> Worth noting, both were run from the same source (compiled on different 
> machines) and on the same pages, however the files differ in size by 6 
> bytes.  I did not look into why this was the case.

I've noticed a 1-byte discrepancy on sets that should be identical as well.
It's most likely an issue with flushing/properly closing the output
streams. 

Could you investigate and resolve this?

- Gordon
